nima
  • Reference

R/nima

A collection of miscellaneous tools comprising the personal R package of Nima Hejazi

Author: Nima Hejazi

Description

R/nima is an R package comprised of miscellaneous personal tools that are useful to me.

This package is made public for my own convenience, with no guarantees whatsoever.

Installation

Install a fairly recent stable release from CRAN:

install.packages("nima")

Install the most recent stable release from GitHub via devtools:

devtools::install_github("nhejazi/nima")

Install the development version from GitHub via devtools:

devtools::install_github("nhejazi/nima", ref = "develop")

Issues

If you encounter any bugs or have any specific feature requests, please file an issue.
